opening_theme: "Daisuki dayo Daisuki dayo Umaretekite Arigatou (大好きだよ大好きだよ　生まれてきてありがとう)" by Yuki Kurihara (CV: Ai Kakuma) & Shinya Momotsuki (CV: Nobuhiko Okamoto) (TV 2-12)
ending_theme: OVA: "Yawarakakutte Yasashii Jikan (やわらかくって優しい時間)" by Yuki Kurihara (Ai Kakuma)
